config.description: Specifies the path to the desired graphql code generator config file to be processed instead of the default path. Both absolute and relative paths are supported.

silent.description: If true, the executor will not log any output to the console. Defaults to false.

verbose.description: If true, the executor will log additional information to the console. Defaults to false.

debug.description: If true, the executor will log debug information to the console. Defaults to false.

errorsOnly.description: If true, the executor will only log errors to the console. Defaults to false.
